question_stem:
Q4. Continuing with the R code for Question 4 above, write R code to form a confusion matrix between the predicted class label and the real class label of the test set. Calculate and report the accuracy in the blank.
Note: only report the answer, not include the code in the blank provided.
question_stem_html:
Q4. Continuing with the R code for Question 4 above, write R code to form a confusion matrix between the predicted class label and the real class label of the test set. Calculate and report the accuracy in the blank.
Note: only report the answer, not include the code in the blank provided.

choices.text: not include the code in the blank provided.
choices.text_html: not include the code in the blank provided.

items.solution:
Ans: 0.9 or 90%
																																															confusion.matrix  = table(predicted.class, banktest[  , 11])
																																															
																																															accuracy = sum(diag(confusion.matrix)) / sum(confusion.matrix)
																																															
																																															accuracy
# 0.9
items.solution_html:
Ans: 0.9 or 90%
																																															confusion.matrix  = table(predicted.class, banktest[  , 11])
																																															
																																															accuracy = sum(diag(confusion.matrix)) / sum(confusion.matrix)
																																															
																																															accuracy
# 0.9
